QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_LinearStratumBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Quantity measures associated to a linear stratum such as in a borehole. Uncertainty is documented in _Pset_Uncertainty_.

QtoDef.Name: Diameter
QtoDef.Definition: Actual diameter of sample or segment.

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition: Effective length sampled, if lower end of segment known
